definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

pinyin: hai3 yang2 wen1 cha1 fa1 dian4

sentences.english: The warehouse manager attributed the collapse to a big temperature difference.
sentences.chinese: 粮库管理者称，粮仓坍塌原因是”温差过大”。

sentences.english: After aeration the temperature divergence of each metre grain layer was lower than 1℃.
sentences.chinese: 该系统通风降温效果好，通风后每米粮层温差<1℃。

sentences.english: The temperature difference between two adjacent tubes is in a safe range, causing no excess thermal stress.
sentences.chinese: 管间温差也在允许范围内，不会引起过大的温差应力。

sentences.english: The temperature difference between two adjacent tubes is in a safe range, causing no excess thermal stress.
sentences.chinese: 管间温差也在允许范围内，不会引起过大的温差应力。

sentences.english: Natural frequency of the riser will decrease due to the internal fluid flowing and temperature differential.
sentences.chinese: 管内流体流动和管内外温差会降低立管的固有频率。

sentences.english: A greater temperature differential yields more electricity.
sentences.chinese: 如果温差越高，则产生的电能就越多。

sentences.english: The voltage may provides an analog representation of the temperature difference .
sentences.chinese: 电压可以成为温差的模拟表示。

sentences.english: Thermal engine is the drive-device of AUV driven by temperature difference energy.
sentences.chinese: 热机是温差能驱动水下监测平台的动力装置。

sentences.english: The power generation technology utilizing the temperature difference of engine exhaust gas is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了利用发动机排气余热的温差发电技术。

sentences.english: Wind is caused by differences in the temperature of air.
sentences.chinese: 风是由空气的温差引起的。

sentences.english: The domain factor for height of first lateral branch and branch numbers of this variety was ACHT value.
sentences.chinese: 第一分枝高度与花茎分枝数目影响因子为累积高温差。

sentences.english: Good clocks have pendulums which are automatically pensated for temperature changes.
sentences.chinese: 好的钟摆可以主动赔偿温度造成的温差。

sentences.english: The thermoelectric convertor makes use of this differential to generate an electric current.
sentences.chinese: 热电变换器利用这种温差来产生电流。

sentences.english: Temperature at the dawn or dusk may low, please bring more clothes. Ladies please don't wear high-heeled shoes.
sentences.chinese: 早晚温差较大，请适当增减衣服，女士请勿穿高跟鞋。

sentences.english: The thermoelectric effect is the direct conversion of temperature differences to electric voltage and vice-versa.
sentences.chinese: 热电效应能将温差直接转换成电压，反之亦然。

sentences.english: Temperature difference between day and night on large, long-sleeved jacket on the Canadian line.
sentences.chinese: 日夜温差就比较大，长袖加外套就行。
